text: Christina Wilhelmina "Stein" Baas-Kaiser (20 May 1938 â€“ 23 June 2022) was a Dutch speed skater. She was born in Delft, Netherlands. She won a gold and silver medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Kaiser also won two bronze medals at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Kaiser died on 23 June 2022 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Netherlands Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Netherlands Category:Dutch speed skaters Category:Sportspeople from Delft
title: Stien Kaiser
